statements: SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, transaction_id FROM regulatory_compliance;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_details FROM regulatory_compliance ORDER BY transaction_id DESC;
SELECT id, transaction_id, timestamp FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-15' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, transaction_id FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_details FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE id = 10;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' AND transaction_details LIKE '%fraud%';
SELECT id, timestamp, transaction_details FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM transaction_details;
SELECT amount, timestamp, transaction_id FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT details FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE entry_id = 3;
SELECT timestamp, transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_details ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance ORDER BY entry_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transaction_details WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT entry_id, details FROM regulatory_compliance WHERE timestamp >= '2022-03-01' AND timestamp <= '2022-03-31' ORDER BY entry_id;
SELECT MAX(amount) AS max_amount, MIN(amount) AS min_amount FROM transaction_details;
SELECT * FROM transaction_details JOIN regulatory_compliance ON transaction_details.transaction_id = regulatory_compliance.entry_id;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audit WHERE audit_action = 'update' ORDER BY audit_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customer_details WHERE customer_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, customer_id FROM transactions WHERE customer_id = 456 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_address FROM customer_details WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_audit WHERE audit_action = 'DELETE' AND audit_date >= '2021-06-01' ORDER BY audit_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, transaction_amount FROM customer_details JOIN transactions ON customer_details.customer_id = transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount > 5000 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT user_name, email, address FROM user_details;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, description FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, user_id, log_details FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT regulation_name, description, timestamp FROM regulatory_data WHERE regulation_name LIKE '%GDPR%';
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 100 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM user_details WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT description FROM transaction_logs WHERE log_id = 12345;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' AND regulation_name LIKE '%GDPR%';
SELECT transaction_id, amount FROM transactions WHERE timestamp >= '2022-05-01' ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM timestamps
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 100
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_registered_at > '2022-01-01'
SELECT * FROM audit_logs WHERE action = 'Login'
SELECT user_id, status FROM compliance_status ORDER BY last_checked_at DESC
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, user_email, user_registered_at FROM users WHERE user_registered_at > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_name, user_email FROM users WHERE user_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS avg_amount FROM transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT user_name, status FROM users JOIN compliance_status ON users.user_id = compliance_status.user_id WHERE status = 'active';
